alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Morgan County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 6:29PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Arapahoe, south central Morgan, west central Washington and eastern Adams Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 629 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Leader, or 29 miles southwest of Fort Morgan, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shamrock, Strasburg, Leader, Byers, Woodrow and Adena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
